string.name: help_instructions
string.br: 1. Click a box to reveal its value. Boxes can be blank, a number value, or a mine.\n
2. Blank boxes reveal all other blank boxes in the area along with the numbered boxes surrounding it.\n
3. If you hit a mine you lose!\n
4. You will gain points for every numbered value box you uncover. Your points will carry on to the next game until you lose.\n
5. If you win the game, you can continue adding to your score with a new game until you lose.

resources.string: If you press "Apply" or Default then your current game will be deleted and your points will be set to 0!
